item.title: About
item.description:
// WIP //

This is the about page for my personal website.

// WIP//

Who am I?

Hi! I’m Cesar Garcia, a final-year finance student interning at Moody’s Local PE. In my spare time, I enjoy reading, learning new thingsâ„¢, and understanding different perspectives. Currently, I’m focused on coding and preparing for the CFA and FRM.

What have I done?

Succintly: thought, explored, learned, and adapted.

How can I help you?

My experience has helped me develop skills to tackle issues related credit risk, data analysis, and corporate finance. Being at an early stage in my career, however, I’m still learning.
